dt: {bc}a bag (as of strong paper) that has handles and is intended for carrying purchases

shortdef: a bag (as of strong paper) that has handles and is intended for carrying purchases

dt: {bc}a metal or plastic cart with four small wheels that is used for holding merchandise when shopping (as at a supermarket or department store)

dt.t: … about the only amenities besides the jumbo-sized {wi}shopping carts{/wi} are a few flatbed dollies to allow shoppers to get large appliances like refrigerators and washing machines to the cash register and then out to the parking lot.

dt: {bc}a temporary record of items selected for eventual purchase from an online vendor's website

dt.t: To set up shop on the Internet, you need a commerce-enabled Web site, which includes the electronic {wi}shopping cart{/wi}; a connection to the credit card network; and finally, a merchant account …
Delivery charges are the No. 1 reason shoppers abandon a virtual {wi}shopping cart{/wi}, according to Jupiter Media Metrix. Every Internet shopper has a shipping-charge horror story.

shortdef: a metal or plastic cart with four small wheels that is used for holding merchandise when shopping (as at a supermarket or department store)
a temporary record of items selected for eventual purchase from an online vendor's website

dt: {bc}a group of retail stores and service establishments usually with ample parking facilities and usually designed to serve a community or neighborhood

shortdef: a group of retail stores and service establishments usually with ample parking facilities and usually designed to serve a community or neighborhood —called also shopping plaza

dt: {bc}a list of items to be purchased

dt.t: the biggest possible {it}shopping list{/it} of budget cuts

shortdef: a list of items to be purchased; broadly : a list of related items

dt: {bc}a short period of time in which someone buys a lot of things

shortdef: a short period of time in which someone buys a lot of things

dt: {bc}to visit a place or places where goods are sold in order to buy the things (such as groceries) that someone needs to buy

dt.t: I can {it}do your shopping{/it} for you until you get better.

shortdef: to visit a place or places where goods are sold in order to buy the things (such as groceries) that someone needs to buy
